com.thomsonreuters.upa.codec

Class RealHints

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thomsonreuters.upa.codec.RealHints

  • public class RealHints
extends java.lang.Object
    UPA Real Formatting Hint enumeration values.

    Typical Use

    Conversion of Real to double/float is performed by the following formula: 

    •  if (Real.hint() < FRACTION_1)
 {
      outputValue = Real.value()*(pow(10,(Real.hint() - EXPONENT0)));
 }
 else
 {
      outputValue = Real.value()*(pow(2,(Real.hint() - FRACTION_1)));
 }

    Conversion of double/float to Real is performed by the following formula: 

    •  if (inputHint < FRACTION_1)
 {
      Real.value = (inputValue)/(pow(10,(inputHint - EXPONENT0)));
 }
 else
 {
      Real.value = (inputValue)/(pow(2,(inputHint - FRACTION_1)));
 }
    See Also:
    Real
